Description: Spacious Two Bedroom in owner occupied two-family home.2 Bedroom 1 bath with 1100 square feet of living space with private porch. Hardwood floors. Washer and Dryer in building. Located within walking distance to Winthrop center, restaurants, bars, public transportation, shopping, and more. Bathroom will be renovated prior to move-in. Minutes to Orient Heights T-Station and Downtown Boston. Pets welcome with restrictions. Available 9/1
